CustomField.formula: /* Street */ Prospect_2__r.ESC_NBC_Address__Street__s /* + “, City” if City exists */ & IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Prospect_2__r.ESC_NBC_Address__City__s ) ), ", " & Prospect_2__r.ESC_NBC_Address__City__s, "" ) /* + “, StateCode ZIP” if StateCode exists */ & IF( NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Prospect_2__r.ESC_NBC_Address__StateCode__s ) ) ), ", " & TEXT( Prospect_2__r.ESC_NBC_Address__StateCode__s ) & " " & Prospect_2__r.ESC_NBC_Address__PostalCode__s, "" )
CustomField.label: Prospect 2 Address
